description: Combined OpenAPI specification for Upstox Options APIs including Option Chain and Option Contracts endpoints. Note: The Put/Call Option chain is currently not available for the MCX Exchange.

instrument_key.description: Key of an underlying symbol (e.g., NSE_INDEX|Nifty 50). Format: {exchange}|{symbol}

success_response_data_fields.call_options: List of call option contracts (includes strike_price, instrument_key, market_data, option_greeks, etc.)
success_response_data_fields.put_options: List of put option contracts (includes strike_price, instrument_key, market_data, option_greeks, etc.)

instrument_key.description: Key of an underlying symbol (e.g., NSE_INDEX|Nifty 50, NSE_FO|RELIANCE). Format: {exchange}|{symbol}

expiry_date.description: Expiry date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD). Optional.

get_option_contracts.success_response_data_fields: List of option contract details (includes instrument_key, exchange, option_type, strike_price, expiry_date, lot_size, etc.)

error_codes_http_status.401: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token
error_codes_http_status.429: Too many requests - Rate limit exceeded
